LanguageData.PulVenomSting.label: venom sting
LanguageData.PulVenomSting.description: A puncture wound from injected venom. Can cause infection if left untreated, and may cause dementia or carcinomas if allowed to build up from repeated attacks.
LanguageData.VenomBuildup.label: venom buildup
LanguageData.VenomBuildup.description: Venom built up in the system from repeated attacks. Can cause mobility issues, loss of consciousness, and even dementia and/or carcinomas.
LanguageData.VenomBuildup.stages.initial-0.label: initial
LanguageData.VenomBuildup.stages.initial-1.label: initial
LanguageData.VenomBuildup.stages.minor.label: minor
LanguageData.VenomBuildup.stages.moderate.label: moderate
LanguageData.VenomBuildup.stages.serious.label: serious
LanguageData.VenomBuildup.stages.extreme.label: extreme
